title: I have everytime a small window when the game started ...
body:
Hey,
how can I fix it?

replies.body:
Ahhhhh looks like those config settings aren't wanting to save correctly for some reason. Follow these steps one by one, and this should set things straight for ya.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
